original_title: Suspect Arrested in Pelmadulla With Ammunition and Drugs
original_body_lines: A 20-year-old resident of Pathakada, Pelmadulla was arrested with 20 T-56 bullets and three grams of the ICE.The arrest was made by officers from the Ratnapura Divisional Crime Investigation Division, following a tipoff provided by a suspect previously apprehended by the Criminal Investigation Department.
